title: 30 MIN MORNING PILATES || Full Body Mat Pilates Workout (Moderate)
description:
Wake up and energise your body with this 30 Minute Morning Pilates class. 😊

🌸 Mat from Liforme - https://liforme.com/
Use my code 'MOVEWITHNICOLEYOGA' for a discount.


🤍 INSTAGRAM: @movewithnicole



🎥 Videography by Bodie Rex
♫ Music from https://www.epidemicsound.com/referral/n9a93q/





--
DISCLAIMER:
Please consult your doctor or health care professional before starting this workout. If you experience pain or discomfort at any time during this workout, you should stop immediately. By performing these exercises, you do so at your own risk. By using this video, you understand and agree that Move With Nicole Pty Ltd will not be held responsible or liable for any injury or loss you may suffer as a result of this workout video.
channelDescription:
Hi, I'm Nicole! 😊 I am a Certified Pilates & Certified Yoga Instructor (RYT 500) with many years of in-studio teaching experience. As a former dancer and gymnast, I have always had a passion for movement and I love being able to share that passion with others. I believe in finding forms of movement that feel good for your body and soul and I hope that through my classes, I can guide you to your best feeling self!

--
I was a professional Latin Ballroom Dancer and taught Ballroom dancing to adults for 7+ years. This is truly where I established my passion for teaching movement. When I retired from competitive dancing in 2017, I began teaching Barre and Pilates in studios and gyms in Sydney.

During COVID lockdown, Dance & Pilates studios closed and that was when I poured my love of teaching into this channel, hoping to help people keep moving and feeling good!

Thank you so much for practicing with me and I hope you enjoy the classes as much as I love creating them for you. 🩷
tags: at home pilates workout no equipment
embedHtml: <iframe width="480" height="270" src="//www.youtube.com/embed/C3LB3Qszx2I" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
comments: To everyone who struggled with this workout: You don’t have to be out of shape to have a hard time with this. I’m in good shape for alot of things…but this has some things that were very hard for me. Focus on having good posture, don’t give up. It will get easier with practice! And if you aren’t at your physical best, be proud of yourself for trying these moves, they are hard!!!
So happy to have the weekly playlist back, thanks Nicole!
I recommended you to all my close friends, I have been doing your videos 5X a week for the last 3 yrs.Thank you for making me feel great everyday😊

I am 74. Been doing various types of yoga (Iyengar, Kundalini, Hatha, Yin) over the last 45 years. All the harder maybe to put up with sagging skin, dwindling muscles and aching knees.

My granddaughter introduced me to your videos.

I knew straightaway they were good for me. Guess what: after a 3-week daily practice, even though the change may not show from the outside, I feel an inner swing from the pelvic floor and balance is steadier. I’ll certainly keep going. Merci Nicole!
I can’t believe I forgot how good this feels. I love having control over my body.
